name: Gita Chrome Extension
description: Find the sloka from Bhagavat Gita by choosing any chapter and sloka

name: BS ICS File
description: The ics file for your favorite calendar application. This repo contains the iCalendar file for the Bikram Sambat 2080. The files are available month wise as well as for the whole year.

name: Daily Prices Email
description: Receive daily email in your inbox. The email contains the price of the fuel and the vegetables.

name: Fuel Prices
description: A simple website that displays the prices of the fuel in the Kathmandu region.

name: Nepali Panchanga
description: Chrome extension that contains the nepali calendar, panchang and horoscope.

name: Web Info
description: This website is developed to show what permissions can be gathered by the website from the viewer I have added the features of showing the IP address, GPS address, OS info, browser info and ISP info. Further features will be added.

name: Nepal Local Government
description: An application that filters out different local bodies of Nepal.
